definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to foretell the future using the trigrams of the Book of Changes 易經|易经

sentences.english: Scholars held for Jiujiang Rong Division auxiliary, You Chang know in Guangzhou, in order to stop things.
sentences.chinese: 举进士，为九江戎司掾，又尝知广州，以事罢。

official registrar (of a county etc) in imperial China

honorific title during Tang to Qing times, approx. "Glorious grand master"
senior provincial official in imperial China
